title: Sorry, but I have to drop out of tonight's SVJUG meeting
body:
I had to have some unexpected surgery done on Monday. Nothing huge,
but they've got me on tasty drugs and my jaw is a mess - talking is
hard. I remembered to tell the DOAG and DEVOXX organizers that I
wasn't going to be able to show up for their events, but I forgot
to tell the SVJUG organizers until just a few minutes ago. Sorry
folks. It's going to be a few weeks until I can do much.
